text:
Since her debut on American Idol as a fresh-faced blonde who could sing like nobody else, Carrie Underwood has taken the country music world by storm. Through the years, her style has evolved, but she's consistently proved herself to be quite the fashionista, especially on Country Music's Biggest Night, at the CMA Awards.

Underwood has donned everything from short and sparkly dresses to downright glamorous gowns, and the "Smoke Break" hitmaker can pull off every single color of the rainbow, from tangerine orange to kelly green. Now that she's entering into her 11th year as co-host of the CMAs, Underwood's outfit changes throughout the show are expected -- looked forward to, even -- and she rarely disappoints. Click through the photo gallery above to see the singer's best looks from CMA Awards past, starting with her 2006 CMA Awards red carpet dress.

The 2018 CMA Awards are scheduled to air on ABC on Nov. 14, at 8PM ET. The ceremony will take place live at Nashville’s Bridgestone Arena, and Underwood and Brad Paisley will host for the 11th year in a row.

The Boot will be staying up late covering the most buzzed-about winners, fashion and moments at the 2018 CMA Awards. Readers can watch along with us by checking back to TheBoot.com for the latest CMAs headlines, liking The Boot on Facebook and following The Boot on Twitter.
title: Carrie Underwood’s Best CMA Awards Looks [PICTURES]
